issue.title: [R][Dataset] Expose more FileSystemDatasetFactory options
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9657](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9657). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Among the features:

- ignore_prefixes option
- Pass an explicit list of files + base directory
- Exclude invalid files (boolean) option
  
  An important use case this would allow/fix is being able to open_dataset("really_really_big_file.csv") so you can partition/write it.
